An explosive ball of icy hail that can be used to strike targets anywhere on the map. On first use, Kaldr launches a tracer towards the targeted location.  The second use marks the current location of the blast, upon which the actual projectile is launched - the greater the distance, the larger the radius affected. Frostbitten units will take minor damage over time; if the units drop below a certain percentage of hitpoints, they'll instantly shatter.

brewmaster_drunken_brawler.notes: Does not stack with evasion from other sources.

Splits Brewmaster into elements, forming 3 specialized warriors, adept at survival. If any of them survive until the end of their summoned timer, the Brewmaster is reborn.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
brewmaster_primal_split.lore: It isn't clear whether Mangix is consciously aware of his potent bond with nature, as it often occurs in the midst of a drunken stupor.
brewmaster_primal_split.notes:
The Earth Element will carry all auras that the Brewmaster has, as well as True Sight.
When the spell ends, Brewmaster will take the place of an element in this order, assuming they are alive: Earth, Storm, Fire.

bristleback_bristleback.lore: Turning his back to a fight might be just the thing.
bristleback_bristleback.notes:
Bristleback's rear is considered to be within 70 degrees from the back.
Bristleback's side is considered to be within 110 degrees from the back.

bristleback_quill_spray.lore: An enforcer's honor can be a prickly thing.  So can his quills.
bristleback_quill_spray.notes: Quill Spray damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.

bristleback_warpath.lore: 'Temper, temper,' his mum always chided.  But in a fight, a temper can come in handy.
bristleback_warpath.notes:
Bristleback's illusions will receive the bonuses.
Items will not trigger Warpath.

Broodmother's venom cripples enemy units, causing her attacks to slow and giving the affected unit a chance to miss its attacks.

Incapacitating Bite is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.
broodmother_incapacitating_bite.lore: Paralytic toxins come from Black Arachnia's fangs, causing a slow and painful death to those who intrude on her webs.
broodmother_incapacitating_bite.notes: The miss chance stacks with evasion and terrain dodge chance.

broodmother_insatiable_hunger.lore: While most of her prey is wrapped in silken cocoons and saved for her young, the Broodmother herself has a taste for wandering heroes.
broodmother_insatiable_hunger.notes:
Fully stacks with other sources of lifesteal.
Insatiable hunger can be removed by purge effects.

broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.lore: Black Arachnia continues to raise her young, even amidst the field of combat.  The brood quickly learns how to support their mother.
broodmother_spawn_spiderlings.notes:
If the target is killed within 2 seconds of being hit with this skill, the Spiderlings will spawn.
Units killed by Spiderlings will then give birth to Spiderites, smaller and less powerful versions of the Spiderlings.

Webs never expire, but when the maximum limit of webs is exceeded, the oldest web disappears. You have free movement capabilities while on the Web when the enemy cannot see you.
broodmother_spin_web.lore: Weaving a bed of silken fibers, Arachnia's web both protects her and her offspring, as well as giving advancing opponents a sense of forboding.
broodmother_spin_web.notes:
Has a fade time of 2 seconds.
Also affects Spiderling and Spiderites.

Doesn't create illusions from other illusions, or Meepo clones.

dazzle_poison_touch.desc:
Casts a poisonous spell on an enemy unit, causing damage and slowness over time, and eventual paralysis.  Poison Touch mini-stuns on impact. Slow increases per level.

Level 1 slows the target by 33% during the set time.

Level 2 slows the target by 33% for 2 seconds, then by 66% for 1 second.

Level 3 slows the target by 33%, 66%, and 100%, for one second respectively.

Level 4 slows the target by 33%, then slows the target by 66% for 1 second, then stuns the target for 1 second.
dazzle_poison_touch.lore: One of the few Dezun rites used for offensive purposes, the paralytic enchantment often proves useful.
dazzle_poison_touch.notes:
The damage is not reduced by damage block abilities.

If EMP drains mana from an enemy hero, Invoker gains 50% of the mana drained.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

sniper_take_aim.lore: Kardel always takes it upon himself to stay as far from harm as he can while still performing his role - taking perfect aim.

spectre_desolate.desc: Deals bonus pure damage when Spectre attacks an enemy hero who is alone.

spectre_desolate.notes:
Damage is dealt before Spectre's attack.
Spectre's illusions also have Desolate.

spectre_haunt.notes:
Haunt illusions are uncontrollable, move at 400 base movement speed, and cannot be disabled.
There is a 1 second delay before illusions start attacking their target.

windrunner_windrun.lore: Lyralei enchants gusts of winds to fight incoming attacks.
windrunner_windrun.notes:
The slow will affect enemies with magic immunity.
Windrun will not evade projectiles that were created before it was activated.

wisp_overcharge.attrib:
ATTACK SPEED: 40 / 50 / 60 / 70
INCOMING DAMAGE REDUCTION: 5% / 10% / 15% / 20%
HP/MANA DRAIN: 4.5% / 4.5% / 4.5% / 4.5%
wisp_overcharge.cmb: 2
wisp_overcharge.desc: Io gains bonus attack speed and damage reduction, at the cost of draining HP and mana per second.  If Io is Tethered to an ally, that unit also gains the bonuses.
wisp_overcharge.lore: Drawing on the energy of matter from all worlds, Io begins the unravelling of time.
wisp_overcharge.notes: Io's tethered unit will also benefit from the attack speed and reduction, but only Io pays the drain in HP and mana.

wisp_relocate.attrib:
CAST DELAY: 2.5 / 2.25 / 2
RETURN TIME: 12 / 12 / 12
wisp_relocate.cmb:
100/100/100
90/75/60
wisp_relocate.desc: Teleport yourself and any tethered ally to any location on the map. After the spell expires you and any tethered ally will return to where you teleported from.
wisp_relocate.lore: Io is the embodiment of the mystery of the universe.
wisp_relocate.notes:
Enemies receive a visual indicator on the minimap of the target location during the cast delay.
If Io is disabled during the cast delay, Relocate is cancelled.
If an allied hero is Tethered, that hero will teleported along with you. You can break the tether at any time to prevent that hero from teleporting with you.

EXPLOSION RADIUS: 300 / 300 / 300 / 300

120/130/140/150
20/18/16/14
wisp_spirits.desc: Summon five particle spirits that dance in a circle around Io, damaging all that they hit around you. If a particle hits an enemy hero, it explodes, damaging all enemy units in an area around it.  Creeps take minor damage from touching a particle spirits, but don't cause them to explode.  After the duration, the Spirits will explode.
wisp_spirits.lore: Io twists the particles of the universe with his unimaginable capabilities.

wisp_spirits_in.desc: Calls the spirits closer to you. Can be toggled on and off.

wisp_spirits_out.desc: Sends the spirits farther away from you. Can be toggled on and off.

wisp_tether.attrib:
MAX DISTANCE: 900 / 900 / 900 / 900
MOVEMENT SPEED BONUS: 17%
SLOW DURATION: 0.75 / 1.25 / 1.75 / 2.25
TETHER DURATION: 12 / 12 / 12 / 12

wisp_tether.cmb:
40/40/40/40
12
wisp_tether.desc: Tether yourself to an allied hero, granting both of you bonus movement speed. When you restore health or mana, your target gains 1.5x the amount. Any enemy unit that crosses the tether is slowed. The tether breaks when the allied unit moves too far away, or Io cancels the tether.
wisp_tether.lore: The benevolent touch of Io brings strength from between the planes.
wisp_tether.notes:
If you try to tether a unit that is 700 distance or further away from Io, he will latch on and pull himself closer to the tethered unit (to a distance of 300).
The tethered unit will heal 50% faster.

wisp_tether_break.cmb: 1
wisp_tether_break.desc: Break the link to the tethered unit.

80
witch_doctor_death_ward.desc:
CHANNELED - Summons a deadly ward to attack enemy heroes.  The Death Ward has attack range of 700, and attacks every .25 seconds.  Level 3 Death Ward bounces once. Lasts 8 seconds.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
witch_doctor_death_ward.lore: Witch Doctor performs a ritualistic dance, one that haunts the dreams of those who live to recount it.
witch_doctor_death_ward.notes:
The Death Ward is invulnerable, and is only destroyed if Witch Doctor is interrupted or its duration expires.
The Death Ward can be controlled, and made to attack a specific target.

witch_doctor_maledict.desc: Curses all enemy Heroes in an area, causing them to take damage every 4 seconds, adding bonus damage for every 100 HP lost since the curse began.
witch_doctor_maledict.lore: Certain voodoo magics can make an enemy regret engaging the Witch Doctor.
witch_doctor_maledict.notes: Damage is based on the difference between the HP values currently and when Maledict was cast.

witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.lore: The Witch Doctor recycles the bones of fallen friends and foes, using the powder as part of his arsenal of charms and alchemy.
witch_doctor_paralyzing_cask.notes: Targets can be hit multiple times, as long as another unit is struck in between the bounces.

witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.lore: Zharvakko's hocus pocus is not limited only to hexxing his opponents and is quite adept at curing ailments.
witch_doctor_voodoo_restoration.notes:

Can heal magic immune units.

zuus_arc_lightning.desc: Hurls a bolt of lightning that leaps through nearby enemy units.
zuus_arc_lightning.lore: Arc Lightning is Zeus' favorite spell to use against puny mortals.

zuus_lightning_bolt.desc: Summons a bolt of lightning to strike an enemy unit, causing damage and a mini-stun. Lightning Bolt also provides True Sight around the target in a radius of 900.
zuus_lightning_bolt.lore: A shocking punishment for rebellious heathen.
zuus_lightning_bolt.notes: You can interrupt channeling spells and items with this ability.

zuus_static_field.desc: Zeus shocks all nearby enemy units whenever he casts a spell, causing damage proportional to their current health.
zuus_static_field.lore: The air crackles with static when the Thundergod walks the world.
zuus_static_field.notes:
The damage from Static Field is dealt before the damage from the used spell.
Using items doesn't trigger Static Field.
Does not require unit visibility to take effect.

zuus_thundergods_wrath.desc:
Strikes all enemy heroes with a bolt of lightning, no matter where they may be.  Thundergod's Wrath also provides True Sight around each hero struck.  If an enemy hero is invisible, it takes no damage, but the True Sight is still created at that hero's location.

Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
zuus_thundergods_wrath.lore: The Lord of Heaven smites all who oppose him, near or far.
